mapper.insert: insert into clazz (id, name, room, begin_date, end_date, master_id, subject, create_time, update_time) values (null, #{name}, #{room}, #{beginDate}, #{endDate}, #{masterId}, #{subject}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select: select id, name, room, begin_date, end_date, master_id, subject, create_time, update_time from clazz
select id, name, room, begin_date, end_date, master_id, subject, create_time, update_time from clazz where id = #{id}
